attributes.action: Scap the proposed scheme to make ID cards compulsery to all British nationals
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The government intends to make ID cards compulsery to all british nationals by 2010, this will waste huge amounts of money and do little to reduce the threat of terrorism or illegal immegration.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
